TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract QueryTable implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._QueryTable, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.RefreshEvents_Event

summary.span: Representa uma tabela de planilha criada a partir de dados retornados de uma fonte de dados externa, como um servidor SQL ou um banco de dados do Microsoft Access.

span.span: Represents a worksheet table built from data returned from an external data source, such as a SQL server or a Microsoft Access database.

summary.span: O objeto QueryTable é um membro da coleção.

span.span: The QueryTable object is a member of the collection.

para.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: Use QueryTables( ), onde é o número de índice da tabela de consulta, para retornar um único objeto QueryTable .

span.span: Use QueryTables(), where is the index number of the query table, to return a single QueryTable object.
